001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.enums;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
004import lombok.Getter;
005import org.openqa.selenium.By;
006import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
007import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
008
009/**
010 * Enum representing different WebElement actions that can be performed.
011 *
012 * <p>Each action provides an implementation for executing the respective WebElement operation
013 * and wrapping elements in {@link SmartWebElement} where applicable.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017@Getter
018public enum WebElementAction {
019
020   /**
021    * Action to find a single WebElement and wrap it in a {@link SmartWebElement}.
022    */
023   FIND_ELEMENT("findElement") {
024      @Override
025      public Object performActionWebElement(WebDriver driver, WebElement element, Object... args) {
026         return new SmartWebElement(element, driver);
027      }
028
029      @Override
030      public Object performActionWebDriver(WebDriver driver, Object... args) {
031         return new SmartWebElement((WebElement) args[0], driver);
032      }
033   },
034
035   /**
036    * Action to find multiple WebElements and wrap them in {@link SmartWebElement} instances.
037    */
038   FIND_ELEMENTS("findElements") {
039      @Override
040      public Object performActionWebElement(WebDriver driver, WebElement element, Object... args) {
041         return element.findElements((By) args[0]).stream()
042               .map(e -> new SmartWebElement(e, driver))
043               .toList();
044      }
045
046      @Override
047      public Object performActionWebDriver(WebDriver driver, Object... args) {
048         return driver.findElements((By) args[0]).stream()
049               .map(e -> new SmartWebElement(e, driver))
050               .toList();
051      }
052   },
053
054   /**
055    * Action to perform a click operation on a WebElement.
056    */
057   CLICK("click") {
058      @Override
059      public Void performActionWebElement(WebDriver driver, WebElement element, Object... args) {
060         element.click();
061         return null;
062      }
063
064      @Override
065      public Object performActionWebDriver(WebDriver driver, Object... args) {
066         return null;
067      }
068   },
069
070   /**
071    * Action to send keys (text input) to a WebElement.
072    */
073   SEND_KEYS("sendKeys") {
074      @Override
075      public Void performActionWebElement(WebDriver driver, WebElement element, Object... args) {
076         element.sendKeys((String) args[0]);
077         return null;
078      }
079
080      @Override
081      public Object performActionWebDriver(WebDriver driver, Object... args) {
082         return null;
083      }
084   },
085
086   /**
087    * Action to submit a WebElement (commonly used for forms).
088    */
089   SUBMIT("submit") {
090      @Override
091      public Void performActionWebElement(WebDriver driver, WebElement element, Object... args) {
092         element.submit();
093         return null;
094      }
095
096      @Override
097      public Object performActionWebDriver(WebDriver driver, Object... args) {
098         return null;
099      }
100   },
101
102   /**
103    * Action to clear the content of a WebElement (commonly input fields).
104    */
105   CLEAR("clear") {
106      @Override
107      public Void performActionWebElement(WebDriver driver, WebElement element, Object... args) {
108         element.clear();
109         return null;
110      }
111
112      @Override
113      public Object performActionWebDriver(WebDriver driver, Object... args) {
114         return null;
115      }
116   };
117
118   /**
119    * Performs the defined action on a WebElement.
120    *
121    * @param driver  The WebDriver instance.
122    * @param element The target WebElement.
123    * @param args    Additional arguments required for the action.
124    * @return The result of the action, if applicable.
125    */
126   public abstract Object performActionWebElement(WebDriver driver, WebElement element, Object... args);
127
128   /**
129    * Performs the defined action using only a WebDriver instance.
130    *
131    * @param driver The WebDriver instance.
132    * @param args   Additional arguments required for the action.
133    * @return The result of the action, if applicable.
134    */
135   public abstract Object performActionWebDriver(WebDriver driver, Object... args);
136
137   /**
138    * Performs the given action on a WebElement.
139    *
140    * @param driver  The WebDriver instance.
141    * @param element The target WebElement.
142    * @param action  The action to perform.
143    * @param args    Additional arguments for the action.
144    * @return The result of the action, if applicable.
145    */
146   public static Object performAction(WebDriver driver, WebElement element, WebElementAction action, Object... args) {
147      return action.performActionWebElement(driver, element, args);
148   }
149
150   /**
151    * The method name associated with the action.
152    */
153   private final String methodName;
154
155   /**
156    * Constructor to associate a method name with the enum constant.
157    *
158    * @param methodName The method name as a string.
159    */
160   WebElementAction(String methodName) {
161      this.methodName = methodName;
162   }
163}
